        Get the length of the map

      • isBlocked

                int x,
                int y)
        Check if the considered tile is isBlocked
        Parameters:
        object - the object that is moving
        x - The x coordinate of the tile
        y - The y coordinate of the tile
        Returns:
        true if the considered tile is isBlocked

            int startX,
            int startY,
            int goalX,
            int goalY)
        Get the cost of moving to a given tile
        Parameters:
        object - The object that is moving
        startX - The x coordinate of the start tile
        startY - The y coordinate of the start tile
        goalX - The x coordinate of the goal tile
        goalY - The y coordinate of the goal tile

        The cost of moving to a given tile
